dakunu aasiyawe boho ratawal ekka baluwama api sapekshawa pirisidukama athin ihalin innawa.indiyawa koyi tharam wegen diyunu unath rate pirisidukama thamath pahala mattamaka thiyenne.lankawata ena godak indiyanuwan ape rate wisheshayen kolambaa pirisidukama warnana karanawa.habayi ithin pirisidu kama kiyanne thamunge kunu anunta dala atha pihada ganima noweyi.awasanawata lankawe sidu wenne eekayi.kolambaa minissu thamunge kunu mithotamulle blumandl wala minissunta dila api dan klin kiyanawa.maharagama tawume minissu nawinne minissunta kunu tika dala klin ap wenawa.anunta kunu dila 'pirisuduwima' misaka ratak widihata jathiyak widihata pirisidu wenna kunutika kalamanakaranaya kara ganna apita kalak yawi.
